Title: The Blockhouse
Writer: Jean-Paul Clébert (based on the book "Le Blockhaus" by), John Gould (created for the screen by), John Gould (screenplay), Clive Rees (screenplay)
Actors: Peter Sellers, Charles Aznavour, Jeremy Kemp, Per Oscarsson
Plot: During D-day several people become trapped while hiding in a bunker, when heavy shelling collapses it. They have plenty of food and water so they decide to wait for rescuers. And so they wait year, after year, after year.
